text: It’s been a while since I tried to do this, but from what I remember it’s just not possible. I think the rendering of the CTA breaks it :confused: If you _really_ want a CTA to include a personalization token, you could create your own button (I have successfully used a personalization token in a link - it was a personalized URL - so this will probably work for the visible text, too, if that’s what you’re doing) - since it’s a linked button, you’ll be able to create an active list or workflow etc if needed for contacts who click on it, like you can any other link in email. I’m _pretty sure_ this would work :slightly_smiling_face: Good luck! Let us know here if you try it out?

:wave: Hi Jaydip! It sounds like you want to make a listing page that would show blog posts which have more than one specific tag (like all posts which have _both_ ‘brand’ AND ‘fashion’)? That’s not possible, but I’m curious to hear more about why you’re looking to do this… ?
